description: Introduce an air of sophisticated luxury to your formal wear portfolio with Balmain's double-breasted coat. The piece has been fashioned in italy from sumptuous black wool, cotton and cashmere blend, making for an elegant finish. The coat also boats long sleeves, a double breasted front fastening, a rear central vent, two front pockets and Balmain's signature gold-tone embossed buttons

transport.description: 此商品1个工作日内买手店APP上进行确认，确认后2-5个工作日发货，发货后预计10个工作日左右能到目的地。如遇节假日及海关地检有可能会相应延长（APP会出相应公告）
